events.name: Marvel Multiverse Q&A
events.fun_description: The cast of your favourite marvel multiverse films are coming to fan expo this year to meet you and answer your questions! Get your tickets to see them and don't be late!
events.guests: Tom Holland, Robert Downey Jr and Chris Hemsworth

events.name: DC Superhero Showdown
events.fun_description: Suit up with your favourite DC heroes as they talk about saving the multiverse, behind-the-scenes stunt stories, and the future of the DC film universe.

events.name: Star Wars: Legends of the Force
events.fun_description: Join Jedi, Sith, and scoundrels from across the galaxy as they share stories from set, fan-favourite moments, and what it really feels like to wield a lightsaber.

events.name: Journey Through Middle-earth
events.fun_description: Return to Middle-earth with cast and creators as they share tales from the road to Mordor, fan questions about the books and films, and what comes next for the legendarium.

events.name: One Piece: Pirates of the Grand Line
events.fun_description: Set sail with the Straw Hat crew! Hear from voice actors and creators about Devil Fruits, favourite arcs, and what it means to chase the One Piece.
events.guests: Voice cast of the Straw Hat Pirates

events.name: Attack on Titan: Walls and Warriors
events.fun_description: Join the Scouts as they dive into the darkest battles, fan theories about the Titans, and how it felt to bring this intense story to life.
events.guests: Titans and Scout Regiment voice actors

events.name: Naruto: Believe It! Reunion
events.fun_description: Celebrate the world of shinobi with a special Naruto reunionâ€”relive iconic fights, talk favourite jutsu, and find out which character the cast relates to most.

amenities.name: Food Court
amenities.description: Grab snacks, full meals, and drinks from a variety of vendors all in one convenient spot.

amenities.name: Help Center
amenities.description: Visit the help center for directions, lost and found, accessibility support, and connections to medical care and on-site first aid.
